Browse the source code of netbsd/external/mpl/bind/dist/bin/confgen/ddns-confgen.c

1/* $NetBSD: ddns-confgen.c,v 1.3 2019/01/09 16:54:58 christos Exp $ */
2

13
14/*! \file */
15
16/**
17 * ddns-confgen generates configuration files for dynamic DNS. It can
18 * be used as a convenient alternative to writing the ddns.key file
19 * and the corresponding key and update-policy statements in named.conf.
20 */
21
22#include <config.h>
23
24#include <stdarg.h>
25#include <stdbool.h>
26#include <stdlib.h>
27
28#include <isc/assertions.h>
29#include <isc/base64.h>
30#include <isc/buffer.h>
31#include <isc/commandline.h>
32#include <isc/file.h>
33#include <isc/mem.h>
34#include <isc/net.h>
35#include <isc/print.h>
36#include <isc/result.h>
37#include <isc/string.h>
38#include <isc/time.h>
39#include <isc/util.h>
40
41#if USE_PKCS11
42#include <pk11/result.h>
43#endif
44
45#include <dns/keyvalues.h>
46#include <dns/name.h>
47#include <dns/result.h>
48
49#include <dst/dst.h>
50#include <confgen/os.h>
51
52#include "util.h"
53#include "keygen.h"
54
55#define KEYGEN_DEFAULT "tsig-key"
56#define CONFGEN_DEFAULT "ddns-key"
57
58static char program[256];
59const char *progname;
60static enum { progmode_keygen, progmode_confgen} progmode;
61bool verbose = false; /* needed by util.c but not used here */
62
63ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE static void
64usage(int status) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
65
66static void
67usage(int status) {
68 if (progmode == progmode_confgen) {
69 fprintf(stderr, "\
70Usage:\n\
71 %s [-a alg] [-k keyname] [-q] [-s name | -z zone]\n\
72 -a alg: algorithm (default hmac-sha256)\n\
73 -k keyname: name of the key as it will be used in named.conf\n\
74 -s name: domain name to be updated using the created key\n\
75 -z zone: name of the zone as it will be used in named.conf\n\
76 -q: quiet mode: print the key, with no explanatory text\n",
77 progname);
78 } else {
79 fprintf(stderr, "\
80Usage:\n\
81 %s [-a alg] [keyname]\n\
82 -a alg: algorithm (default hmac-sha256)\n\n",
83 progname);
84 }
85
86 exit (status);
87}
88
89int
90main(int argc, char **argv) {
91 isc_result_t result = ISC_R_SUCCESS;
92 bool show_final_mem = false;
93 bool quiet = false;
94 isc_buffer_t key_txtbuffer;
95 char key_txtsecret[256];
96 isc_mem_t *mctx = NULL;
97 const char *keyname = NULL;
98 const char *zone = NULL;
99 const char *self_domain = NULL;
100 char *keybuf = NULL;
101 dns_secalg_t alg = DST_ALG_HMACSHA256;
102 const char *algname;
103 int keysize = 256;
104 int len = 0;
105 int ch;
106
107#if USE_PKCS11
108 pk11_result_register();
109#endif
110 dns_result_register();
111
112 result = isc_file_progname(*argv, program, sizeof(program));
113 if (result != ISC_R_SUCCESS)
114 memmove(program, "tsig-keygen", 11);
115 progname = program;
116
117 /*
118 * Libtool doesn't preserve the program name prior to final
119 * installation. Remove the libtool prefix ("lt-").
120 */
121 if (strncmp(progname, "lt-", 3) == 0)
122 progname += 3;
123
124#define PROGCMP(X) \
125 (strcasecmp(progname, X) == 0 || strcasecmp(progname, X ".exe") == 0)
126
127 if (PROGCMP("tsig-keygen")) {
128 progmode = progmode_keygen;
129 quiet = true;
130 } else if (PROGCMP("ddns-confgen")) {
131 progmode = progmode_confgen;
132 } else {
133 INSIST(0);
134 ISC_UNREACHABLE();
135 }
136
137 isc_commandline_errprint = false;
138
139 while ((ch = isc_commandline_parse(argc, argv,
140 "a:hk:Mmr:qs:y:z:")) != -1) {
141 switch (ch) {
142 case 'a':
143 algname = isc_commandline_argument;
144 alg = alg_fromtext(algname);
145 if (alg == DST_ALG_UNKNOWN)
146 fatal("Unsupported algorithm '%s'", algname);
147 keysize = alg_bits(alg);
148 break;
149 case 'h':
150 usage(0);
151 case 'k':
152 case 'y':
153 if (progmode == progmode_confgen)
154 keyname = isc_commandline_argument;
155 else
156 usage(1);
157 break;
158 case 'M':
159 isc_mem_debugging = ISC_MEM_DEBUGTRACE;
160 break;
161 case 'm':
162 show_final_mem = true;
163 break;
164 case 'q':
165 if (progmode == progmode_confgen)
166 quiet = true;
167 else
168 usage(1);
169 break;
170 case 'r':
171 fatal("The -r option has been deprecated.");
172 break;
173 case 's':
174 if (progmode == progmode_confgen)
175 self_domain = isc_commandline_argument;
176 else
177 usage(1);
178 break;
179 case 'z':
180 if (progmode == progmode_confgen)
181 zone = isc_commandline_argument;
182 else
183 usage(1);
184 break;
185 case '?':
186 if (isc_commandline_option != '?') {
187 fprintf(stderr, "%s: invalid argument -%c\n",
188 program, isc_commandline_option);
189 usage(1);
190 } else
191 usage(0);
192 break;
193 default:
194 fprintf(stderr, "%s: unhandled option -%c\n",
195 program, isc_commandline_option);
196 exit(1);
197 }
198 }
199
200 if (progmode == progmode_keygen)
201 keyname = argv[isc_commandline_index++];
202
203 POST(argv);
204
205 if (self_domain != NULL && zone != NULL)
206 usage(1); /* -s and -z cannot coexist */
207
208 if (argc > isc_commandline_index)
209 usage(1);
210
211 /* Use canonical algorithm name */
212 algname = alg_totext(alg);
213
214 DO("create memory context", isc_mem_create(0, 0, &mctx));
215
216 if (keyname == NULL) {
217 const char *suffix = NULL;
218
219 keyname = ((progmode == progmode_keygen)
220 ? KEYGEN_DEFAULT
221 : CONFGEN_DEFAULT);
222 if (self_domain != NULL)
223 suffix = self_domain;
224 else if (zone != NULL)
225 suffix = zone;
226 if (suffix != NULL) {
227 len = strlen(keyname) + strlen(suffix) + 2;
228 keybuf = isc_mem_get(mctx, len);
229 if (keybuf == NULL)
230 fatal("failed to allocate memory for keyname");
231 snprintf(keybuf, len, "%s.%s", keyname, suffix);
232 keyname = (const char *) keybuf;
233 }
234 }
235
236 isc_buffer_init(&key_txtbuffer, &key_txtsecret, sizeof(key_txtsecret));
237
238 generate_key(mctx, alg, keysize, &key_txtbuffer);
239
240
241 if (!quiet)
242 printf("\
243# To activate this key, place the following in named.conf, and\n\
244# in a separate keyfile on the system or systems from which nsupdate\n\
245# will be run:\n");
246
247 printf("\
248key \"%s\" {\n\
249 algorithm %s;\n\
250 secret \"%.*s\";\n\
251};\n",
252 keyname, algname,
253 (int)isc_buffer_usedlength(&key_txtbuffer),
254 (char *)isc_buffer_base(&key_txtbuffer));
255
256 if (!quiet) {
257 if (self_domain != NULL) {
258 printf("\n\
259# Then, in the \"zone\" statement for the zone containing the\n\
260# name \"%s\", place an \"update-policy\" statement\n\
261# like this one, adjusted as needed for your preferred permissions:\n\
262update-policy {\n\
263 grant %s name %s ANY;\n\
264};\n",
265 self_domain, keyname, self_domain);
266 } else if (zone != NULL) {
267 printf("\n\
268# Then, in the \"zone\" definition statement for \"%s\",\n\
269# place an \"update-policy\" statement like this one, adjusted as \n\
270# needed for your preferred permissions:\n\
271update-policy {\n\
272 grant %s zonesub ANY;\n\
273};\n",
274 zone, keyname);
275 } else {
276 printf("\n\
277# Then, in the \"zone\" statement for each zone you wish to dynamically\n\
278# update, place an \"update-policy\" statement granting update permission\n\
279# to this key. For example, the following statement grants this key\n\
280# permission to update any name within the zone:\n\
281update-policy {\n\
282 grant %s zonesub ANY;\n\
283};\n",
284 keyname);
285 }
286
287 printf("\n\
288# After the keyfile has been placed, the following command will\n\
289# execute nsupdate using this key:\n\
290nsupdate -k <keyfile>\n");
291
292 }
293
294 if (keybuf != NULL)
295 isc_mem_put(mctx, keybuf, len);
296
297 if (show_final_mem)
298 isc_mem_stats(mctx, stderr);
299
300 isc_mem_destroy(&mctx);
301
302 return (0);
303}
304
